title: The Hottest show on earth
creator_credit: Jeffrey Schon, Derek Lamb, Wolf Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A humourous film on the subject of home insulation. Topics include: the origins of fossil fuels, how to optimise furnace efficiency, common areas of home heat loss, weather-stripping and insulation. Narrated by David Suzuki.
